name: Gram Mangal

address: Next to Poona Blind Girls School, Kothrud

briefDescription: •Content development from Pre-primary to 10th std•Teachers’ Training from to Pre-primary to 10th std•Parent education•Workshops for Heads/Administrators of Educational Institutes•Production of educational aids and conducting workshops for same•Vikasghar – A school supportive, outside school effort to enhance student’s learning capability and calibre.•Shastralay (Subject labs) – The content trajectory of each subject taught in school is determined and in accordance to that a separate learning area for each subject is marked•Preparing educational literature for teachers to read
